article_title: Facebook Is Working on Self-Protecting Mobile Apps
article_text:
Luong Thai Linh/European Pressphoto Agency

Facebook CSO Alex Stamos says that mobile app developers can no longer assume their apps are running on patched, secure operating systems. That’s why the social network is working on building security directly into the Facebook mobile app.

twitter.description: Facebook CSO Alex Stamos says that mobile app developers can no longer assume their apps are running on patched, secure operating systems. That’s why the social network is working on building security directly into the Facebook mobile app.
twitter.title: Facebook Is Working on Self-Protecting Mobile Apps
